channel.title: Comments on: Book Review: SQL Server Hardware
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Chris Sprinkel
item.dc:creator: Chris Sprinkel
item.content:encoded:
Hey Jes!

Had the opportunity to quickly meet you before the keynote for SQL in the City in Chicago. I happen to be reading Glenn’s book myself at the moment.

I came into databases from a hardware background and find Glenn’s book worth the read as well.

Chris

item.title: By: Glenn Berry
item.dc:creator: Glenn Berry
item.description: Thank you for the very complete and very nice review. I appreciate it Jes!
item.content:encoded: Thank you for the very complete and very nice review. I appreciate it Jes!
